content: this text summarizes a legal case where a community property between two parties en and gi has been dissolved the court has assigned ownership of certain properties to each party and ordered one party to pay a sum of money to the other the court has approved an account submitted by one party except for certain expenses the court of monza has made a final decision stating that en and gi will jointly and undividedly own a real estate property in muggiò en will also be assigned ownership of a flat and a shop in muggiò en and gi have been ordered to pay gi a sum of eur 7056600 along with legal interest additionally en and gi have been ordered to pay gi a sum of eur 74880 along with statutory interest the full costs of the proceedings will be setoff this decision was made on may 14 2013
